```js
class SwitchExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { checked: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <FormField id="sample-switch">
        <Switch
          checked={this.state.checked}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ checked: e.target.checked })}
        />
        <label>Switch with label</label>
      </FormField>
    );
  }
}

<SwitchExample />;
```
